name: @hyurl/grpc-async
description: A gRPC wrapper for Node.js with async functions

scripts.prepublishOnly: tsc --module commonjs --target es2018 --sourceMap true --declaration true index.ts
scripts.postpublish: ls *.js | xargs rm -f && ls *.js.map | xargs rm -f && ls *.d.ts | xargs rm -f

author: A-yon Lee <the@ayon.li>
